thread.title: Great location!
thread.title_full: Great location! - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AQuinney2013
title: Great location!
text:
My partner and I stayed here on a Sunday and Monday night, the check in was quick and easy and the room was a good size. Perfectly located near Waterloo station and right by the London Eye.
The view from the room was a great view of the London Eye and Big Ben.
The location was great and right by Waterloo station so links to London underground and National Rail.
There is a free to use bag store for before or after you check out if you need it.
Would stop here again when visiting London and would use Premier Inn again around the country.
Room Tip: Higher floor for better views. See more room tips
